3.title: ServiceWorker in AMP

3.question: You are loading ServiceWorker using <amp-install-serviceworker>. If the AMP page was served from cache, when will ServiceWorker be installed?

answer.answer1: As soon as the component loads

5.title: ES6 modules
5.subtitle: Question 05
5.question: Which performs best when using ES6 scripts in a cross browser environment?

answer.answer3: ES6 module + transpiled js w/ nomodule
answer.answer4: ES6 module + transpiled js w/ noscript
